UVI.product_version: versions from v4.9 to before v4.19.191
UVI.description:
net:emac/emac-mac: Fix a use after free in emac_mac_tx_buf_send

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.191 by commit 16d8c44be52e3650917736d45f5904384a9da834, it was introduced in version v4.9 by commit b9b17debc69d27cd55e21ee51a5ba7fc50a426cf. For more details please see the references link.
